00013 define('GLST_FORMAT_UNKNOWN',0);
00015 define('GLST_FORMAT_C3',1);
00017 define('GLST_FORMAT_DS',2);
00019 
00021 class GLSTBlock extends CreaturesArchiveBlock {
00022 
00024     
00025     private $history;
00026     private $format = GLST_FORMAT_UNKNOWN;

00041     public function GLSTBlock($object,$name,$content,$flags) {
00042         parent::CreaturesArchiveBlock($object,$name,$content,$flags,PRAY_BLOCK_GLST);
00043         if($object instanceof PRAYFile) {
00044             //Do nothing! Decoding is automated later now :)
00045         } else if($object instanceof CreatureHistory) {
00046             $this->history = $object;
00047         } else {
00048             throw new Exception('Couldn\'t create a GLST block. :(');
00049         }
00050     }
00051 
00053     private function GuessFormat() {
00054         //if I don't know
00055         if($this->format == GLST_FORMAT_UNKNOWN) {
00056             //ask $prayfile if it exists. (look for DSEX, otherwise C3)
00057             if($this->prayfile != null) {
00058                 //prayfile should know
00059                 if(sizeof($this->prayfile->GetBlocks(PRAY_BLOCK_DSEX)) > 0) {
00060                     $format = GLST_FORMAT_DS;
00061                 } else {
00062                     $format = GLST_FORMAT_C3;
00063                 }
00064             } else {
00065                 //history will know. (Though it could be wrong)
00066                 $format = $this->history->GuessFormat();
00067             }
00068             //cache so I don't need to ask again :)
00069             $this->format = $format;
00070         }
00071         return $this->format;
00072     }
00073 
00074 
00076     public function GetHistory() {
00077         $this->EnsureDecompiled();
00078         return $this->history;
00079     }
00080 
00083 
00092     public function GetPHOTBlockName(CreatureHistoryEvent $event) {
00093         $photoname = $event->GetPhotoGraph();
00094         if(empty($photoname)) {
00095             return null;
00096         }
00097         if($this->format == GLST_FORMAT_DS) {
00098             return $photoname.'.DSEX.photo';
00099         } else {
00100             return $photoname.'.photo';
00101         }
00102     }

00111     public function GetPhotoBlock(CreatureHistoryEvent $event) {
00112         if($this->GetPrayFile() instanceof PRAYFile) {
00113             return $block = $this->GetPrayFile()->GetBlockByName($this->GetPHOTBlockName());
00114         } else {
00115             throw new Exception("This GLSTBlock is not connected to a PRAYFile.");
00116         }
00117     }

00123     protected function DecompileBlockData() {   
00124         $reader = new StringReader($this->GetData());
00125         $firstchar = $reader->Read(1);
00126         if($firstchar == chr(0x27)) { //apostrophe thing
00127             //ds
00128             $this->format = GLST_FORMAT_DS;
00129         } else if($firstchar == chr(0x0C)) { //control character
00130             //c3
00131             $this->format = GLST_FORMAT_C3;
00132         } else {
00133             throw new Exception("Couldn't guess the format.");
00134         }
00135         //the first four bytes including $firstchar are probably one integer used to identify the game used.
00136         //We read the first one above and now we're skipping the next three.
00137         $reader->Skip(3); // 3 nulls.
00138         if($reader->ReadInt(4)!=1) { //Always 1, don't know why.
00139             throw new Exception('Either the GLST Block is corrupt or I don\'t understand what the 2nd set of 4 bytes mean.');
00140             return false;
00141         }
00142         $moniker        = $reader->Read($reader->ReadInt(4));
00143         $reader->Skip($reader->ReadInt(4)); //second moniker is always identical and never necessary.
00144         $name           = $reader->Read($reader->ReadInt(4));
00145         $gender         = $reader->ReadInt(4);
00146         $genus          = $reader->ReadInt(4); //0 for norn, 1 for grendel, 2 for ettin
00147         $species        = $reader->ReadInt(4);
00148         $eventslength   = $reader->ReadInt(4);
00149         $this->history = new CreatureHistory($moniker,$name,$gender,$genus,$species);
00150 
00151         if(!isset($eventslength)) {
00152             return false;
00153         }
00154         for($i=0;$i<$eventslength;$i++) {
00155             $this->DecodeEvent($reader);
00156         }
00157 
00158         //reading the footer
00159         $unknown1 = $reader->ReadInt(4);
00160         $unknown2 = $reader->ReadInt(4);
00161         if($this->format == GLST_FORMAT_DS) {
00162             $unknown3 = $reader->ReadInt(4);
00163             $warpveteran = (($reader->ReadInt(4)==1)?1:0);
00164             $unknown4 = $reader->Read($reader->ReadInt(4));
00165             $this->history->SetDSUnknowns($unknown1,$unknown2,$unknown3,$unknown4);
00166             $this->history->SetWarpVeteran($warpveteran);
00167         } else {
00168             $this->history->SetC3Unknowns($unknown1,$unknown2);
00169         }
00170     }
00171 
00172 
00174     private function DecodeEvent($reader) {
00175         $eventNumber = $reader->ReadInt(4);
00176         //echo 'Event '.$eventNumber."\n";
00177         if($eventNumber < 18) {
00178             $eventnumber    = $eventNumber;
00179             $worldtime      = $reader->ReadInt(4);
00180             $creatureage    = $reader->ReadInt(4);
00181             $timestamp      = $reader->ReadInt(4);
00182             $lifestage      = $reader->ReadInt(4);
00183             $moniker        = $reader->Read($reader->ReadInt(4));
00184             $moniker2       = $reader->Read($reader->ReadInt(4));
00185             $usertext       = $reader->Read($reader->ReadInt(4));
00186             $photograph     = $reader->Read($reader->ReadInt(4));
00187             $worldname      = $reader->Read($reader->ReadInt(4));
00188             $worldUID       = $reader->Read($reader->ReadInt(4));
00189             $event = new CreatureHistoryEvent($eventnumber,$worldtime,$creatureage,
00190                 $timestamp,$lifestage,$moniker,$moniker2,$usertext,$photograph,
00191                 $worldname,$worldUID);
00192             if($this->format == GLST_FORMAT_DS) {
00193                 $DSUser     = $reader->Read($reader->ReadInt(4));
00194                 $unknown1   = $reader->ReadInt(4);
00195                 $unknown2   = $reader->ReadInt(4);
00196                 $event->AddDSInfo($DSUser,$unknown1,$unknown2);
00197             }
00198             $this->history->AddEvent($event);
00199             return true;
00200         }
00201         return false;       
00202     }
00203

00210     protected function CompileBlockData($format=GLST_FORMAT_UNKNOWN) {
00211         //if you don't know
00212         if($format == GLST_FORMAT_UNKNOWN) {
00213             $format = $this->GuessFormat();
00214         }   
00215         $compiled = Archive($this->history->Compile($format));
00216         return $compiled;
00217     }
